languages.text: "Если тебе удастся убить ее — беги. Синисториа не оставит подобной дерзости без ответа. А ее гнев в сотню раз опаснее, чем ярость Кикеросс. Не возвращайся в Прорву, там тебе уже будет не укрыться. Ищи спасения в других шпилях, и тем ты чуть продлишь свою агонию".

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."
languages.original_text: "Если тебе удастся убить ее — беги. Синисториа не оставит подобной дерзости без ответа. А ее гнев в сотню раз опаснее, чем ярость Кикеросс. Не возвращайся в Прорву, там тебе уже будет не укрыться. Ищи спасения в других шпилях, и тем ты чуть продлишь свою агонию".

traits.locale_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not leave such an outrage unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous that Keykeross's rage. Do not go back to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Look for salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short while."

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not leave such an outrage unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous that Keykeross's rage. Do not go back to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Look for salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short while."

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not leave such impertinence unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not leave such impertinence unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

"If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

languages.text: « Si vous parvenez à la tuer, fuyez. Sinisthoria ne tolérera pas une telle impertinence et sa colère est bien plus redoutable que celle de Keykeross. Ne retournez pas dans l'Abîme, vous n'y trouverez aucune protection. Tentez de vous abriter dans les autres tours, et vous parviendrez peut-être à échapper à la mort quelques heures de plus. »
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous parvenez à la tuer, fuyez. Sinisthoria ne tolérera pas une telle impertinence et sa colère est bien plus redoutable que celle de Keykeross. Ne retournez pas dans l'Abîme, vous n'y trouverez aucune protection. Tentez de vous abriter dans les autres tours, et vous parviendrez peut-être à échapper à la mort quelques heures de plus. »

languages.text: “如果你杀了她的话，那就赶紧逃命吧。希斯索莉亚绝不会容忍这样的罪行，她的怒火比绮克萝丝要危险百倍。到了那个时候，不要再回到裂隙，这里不会有任何人愿意庇护你。去其他尖塔寻求救赎吧，这样的话，你的痛苦说不定还能暂时延长一段时间。”
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: “如果你杀了她的话，那就赶紧逃命吧。希斯索莉亚绝不会容忍这样的罪行，她的怒火比绮克萝丝要危险百倍。到了那个时候，不要再回到裂隙，这里不会有任何人愿意庇护你。去其他尖塔寻求救赎吧，这样的话，你的痛苦说不定还能暂时延长一段时间。”

languages.text: "Wenn es Euch gelingt, sie zu töten, lauft. Sinisthoria wird solche Impertinenz nicht ungestraft lassen, und ihr Zorn ist einhundert Mal gefährlicher als Keykeross' Zorn. Kehrt nicht in die Kluft zurück, Ihr werdet dort keine Zuflucht finden. Sucht in anderen Türmen Erlösung, dann könnt Ihr Eure Pein vielleicht ein klein wenig verlängern."
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es Euch gelingt, sie zu töten, lauft. Sinisthoria wird solche Impertinenz nicht ungestraft lassen, und ihr Zorn ist einhundert Mal gefährlicher als Keykeross' Zorn. Kehrt nicht in die Kluft zurück, Ihr werdet dort keine Zuflucht finden. Sucht in anderen Türmen Erlösung, dann könnt Ihr Eure Pein vielleicht ein klein wenig verlängern."

languages.text: «Si consigues matarla, sal corriendo. Sinisthoria no permitirá que tal insolencia quede impune, y su ira es cien veces más peligrosa que la de Keykeross. Y no vuelvas al Abismo, no encontrarás cobijo allí. Si buscas refugio en otras torres, puede que consigas retrasar tu sufrimiento por un breve periodo».
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: «Si consigues matarla, sal corriendo. Sinisthoria no permitirá que tal insolencia quede impune, y su ira es cien veces más peligrosa que la de Keykeross. Y no vuelvas al Abismo, no encontrarás cobijo allí. Si buscas refugio en otras torres, puede que consigas retrasar tu sufrimiento por un breve periodo».

languages.text: 「彼女を殺したら、逃げろ。シニストリアはこのような不遜な行為は必ず罰っするだろう。彼女の怒りはキーケロスの怒りの何百倍も危険だ。裂け目には戻るな。あそこに隠れる場所はない。他の尖塔に救いを求めれば、苦しみが長引いてしまう危険性がある」
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女を殺したら、逃げろ。シニストリアはこのような不遜な行為は必ず罰っするだろう。彼女の怒りはキーケロスの怒りの何百倍も危険だ。裂け目には戻るな。あそこに隠れる場所はない。他の尖塔に救いを求めれば、苦しみが長引いてしまう危険性がある」

languages.text: "Onu öldürmeyi başarırsan, direkt kaç. Sinisthoria böylesi bir küstahlığın cezasız kalmasına müsaade etmez ve onun gazabı, Keykeross'un öfkesinden yüz kat daha tehlikelidir. Yarık'a dönme, orada güvenli bir yer bulamazsın. Kurtuluşu diğer kulelerde ara ve böylece belki de ızdırabını bir süre daha uzatabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "If you manage to kill her, run. Sinisthoria will not let such impertinence go unpunished, and her wrath is a hundredfold more dangerous than Keykeross's fury. Do not return to the Chasm — you will find no shelter there. Seek salvation in other spires, and you may prolong your agony for a short time."

traits.locale_text: "Onu öldürmeyi başarırsan, direkt kaç. Sinisthoria böylesi bir küstahlığın cezasız kalmasına müsaade etmez ve onun gazabı, Keykeross'un öfkesinden yüz kat daha tehlikelidir. Yarık'a dönme, orada güvenli bir yer bulamazsın. Kurtuluşu diğer kulelerde ara ve böylece belki de ızdırabını bir süre daha uzatabilirsin."
